Questions: How does an Agent respond when it can't understand the request or find any requested information?
optionA: With a preconfigured message, based on the action type
optionB: With a generated error message
optionC: With a general message asking the user to rephrase the request

Questions:
Which scenario best demonstrates when an Agentforce Data Library is most
useful for improving an AI agent's response accuracy?
optionA:
When data is being retrieved fram Snowflake using zero-copy for
vectorization and retrieval.
optionB:
When the Al agent must provide answers based on a curated set of policy
documents that are stored, regularly updated, and Indexed in the data
library.
optionC:
When the AI agent needs to combine data from disparate sources based
on mutually common data, such as Customer Id and Product Id for
grounding.

Questions:
Universal Containers (UC) uses a file upload-based data library and custom
prompt to support Al-driven training content. However, users report that the AI
frequently returns outdated documents.
which corrective action should UC implement to improve content relevancy?
optionA:
Continue using the default retriever without filters, because periodic re-
uploads will eventually phase out outdated documents without further
configuration or the need for custom retrievers.
optionB:
Switch the data library source from file uploads to a Knowledge-based
data library, because Salesforce Knowledge bases automatically manage
document recency, ensuring current documents are returned.
optionC:
Configure a custom retriever that includes a filter condition limiting
retrieval to documents updated within a defined recent period, ensuring
that only current content is used for AI responses.

Questions:
Universal Containers needs its sales reps to be able to only execute prompt templates.
What should the company use to achieve this requirement?
optionA: Prompt Template Manager permission set
optionB: Prompt Execute Template permission set
optionC: Prompt Template User permission set

Questions: What Is true of Agentforce Testing Center?
optionA: Running tests does not consume Einstein Requests.
optionB: Agentforce Testing Center can only be used in a production environment.
optionC: Running tests risks modifying CRM data in a production environment.

Questions:
Universal Containers wants to implement a solution In Salesforce with a
custom UX that allows users to enter a sales order number. Subsequently, the system
will invoke a custom prompt template to create and display a summary of the sales
order header and sales order details.
Which solution should an Agentforce Specialist implement to meet this requirement?
optionA:
Create a template-triggered prompt flow and invoke the prompt template
using the standard “Prompt Template" flow action.
optionB:
Create a screen flow to collect sales order number and invoke the prompt
template using the standard "Prompt Template” flow action.
optionC:
Create an autolaunched flow and invoke the prompt template using the
Standard “Prompt Template" flow action.

Questions:
In a Knowledge-based data library configuration, what is the primary
difference between the identifying fields and the content fields?
optionA:
Identifying fields highlight key terms for relevance scoring, while content
fields store the full text of the article for retrieval.
optionB:
Identifying fields help locate the correct Knowledge article, while content
fields enrich AI responses with detatled information.
optionC:
Identifying fields categorize articles for indexing purposes, while content
fields provide a brief summary for display.

For an Agentforce Data Library that contains uploaded files, what occurs

optionA: Indexes the uploaded files into Data Cloud

Modifying and updating data within the source systems connected to Data
Cloud

optionA: Action Instructions tell the large language model (LLM) which action to use.
optionB: Action Instructions tell the user how to call this action in a conversation.
optionC: Action Instructions define the expected user experience of an action.

Analysis reports to review effectiveness.

What considerations should an Agentforce Specialist be aware of when

Empty data, such as fields without values or sections without limits, is

Questions:
What Is the role of the large language model! (LLM) in understanding intent

Determine a user's topic access and sort actions by priority to be

Identify the best matching topic and actions and correct order of

Questions:
Universal Containers (UC) Is rolling out an Al-powered support assistant to
help customer service agents quickly retrieve relevant troubleshooting steps and
policy guidelines. The assistant relies on a search index in Data Cloud that contains

versions that no longer apply.
How should UC address this issue?
optionA:
Create a custom retriever in Einstein Studio, and apply filters for
publication date and product line.
optionB:
Modify the search index to only store documents from the last year and
remove older records.
optionC:
Use the default retriever, as it already searches the entire search index
and provides broad coverage.

 License

Questions:
What should Universal Containers consider when deploying an Agentforce
Service Agent with multiple topics and Agent Actions to production?
optionA:
Deploy agent components without a test run in staging, relying on
production data for reliable results. Sandbox configuration alone ensures
seamless production deployment.
optionB:
Deploy flows or Apex after agents, topics, and Agent Actions to avoid
deployment failures and potential production agent issues requiring
complete redeployment.

Ensure all dependencies are included, Apex classes meet 75% test
 coverage, and configuration settings are aligned with production. Plan for
version management and post-deployment activation,

Questions: How does the Al retriever function within Data Cloud?
optionA:
It monitors and aggregates data quality metrics across various data
 pipelines to ensure only high-integrity data is used for strategic decisionmaking.

 into standardized datasets for use in historical trend analysis and
forecasting.

It performs contextual searches over an indexed repository to quickly
 fetch the most relevant documents, enabling grounding AI responses with
trustworthy, verifiable information.

What is the correct process to leverage Prompt Builder in a Salesforce org?

optionC: Einstein Reply Recommendations

Questions: How is Data Cloud leveraged by the Answer Questions with Knowledge action in Agentforce?
optionA: Data Cloud stores and manages the indexed  Knowledge articles.
optionB: Data Cloud is not required; the articles can be  accessed directly from the CRM by the agent.
optionC: Data Cloud provides the real-time data streams that update the Knowledge articles.

Questions: Universal Containers (UC) has a legacy system that needs to integrate with Salesforce. UC wishes to create a digest of account action plans using the generative API feature. Which API service should UC use to meet this requirement?
optionA: REST API
optionB: Metadata API
optionC: SOAP API

Questions: Based on the user utterance, ‘Show me all the customers in New York’, which standard Agent action will the planner service use?
optionA: Select Records
optionB: Query Records
optionC: Fetch Records

Questions: A sales manager needs to contact leads at scale with hyper-relevant solutions and customized communications in the most efficient manner possible. Which Salesforce solution best suits this need?
optionA: Einstein Sales Assistant
optionB: Prompt Builder
optionC: Einstein Lead follow-up

Questions:
An Agentforce Service Agent, who has been successfully assisting customers with service requests in Salesforce, is now unable to help customers with issues related to a new product replacement process. The company recently implemented a custom Product Replacement object in Salesforce to track and manage these replacements.
 Which Agentforce Agent User change must be implemented to address this issue?
optionA: The profile assigned to the Agentforce Agent User needs AI training permission to the custom Product Replacement object.
optionB: The permission set assigned to the Agent User needs Read access to the custom Product Replacement object.
optionC: The permission set group assigned to the Agent User needs to grant access to the Product Replacement flow.

Questions: Universal Containers deployed the new Agentforce Sales Development Representative (SDR) into production, but sales reps are saying they can't find it. What is causing this issue?
optionA: Sales rep users do not have access to the SDR Agent object.
optionB: Sales rep users profiles are missing the Allow SDR Agent permission.
optionC: Sales rep users are missing the Use SDR Agent permission set.

Questions:
An Agentforce Specialist is creating a custom action for Agentforce.
 Which setting should the Agentforce Specialist test and iterate on to ensure the action performs as expected?
optionA: Action Instructions
optionB: Action Name
optionC: Action Input

Questions: An administrator wants to check the response of the Flex prompt template they've built, but the preview button is greyed out. What is the reason for this?
optionA: The prompt has not been saved and activated.
optionB: The records related to the prompt have not been selected.
optionC: A merge field has not been inserted in the prompt.

Questions: Universal Containers (UC) wants to enable its sales reps to explore opportunities that are similar to previously won opportunities by entering the utterance, “Show me other opportunities like this one.” How should UC achieve this with Agents?
optionA: Create a custom Agent action calling an Apex class.
optionB: Use the standard Agent action.
optionC: Create a custom Agent action calling a flow.

Questions: When a customer chat is initiated, which functionality in Salesforce provides generative AI replies or draft emails based on recommended Knowledge articles?
optionA: Einstein Reply Recommendations
optionB: Einstein Service Replies
optionC: Einstein Grounding

Questions: Universal Containers wants to allow its service agents to query the current fulfillment status of an order with natural language. There is an existing autolaunched flow to query the information from Oracle ERP, which is the system of record for the order fulfillment process. How should an Agentforce Specialist apply the power of conversational AI to this use case?
optionA: Create a custom Agent action which calls a flow.
optionB: Create a Flex prompt template in Prompt Builder.
optionC: Configure the Integration Flow Standard Action in Agent Builder.

Questions:
Universal Containers is planning a marketing email about products that most closely match a customer's expressed interests. 
What should the company use to generate this email?
optionA: Custom sales email template which is grounded with interest and product information
optionB: Standard email marketing template using Apex or flows for matching interest in products
optionC: Standard email draft with Einstein and choose standard email template

Questions:
Universal Containers has seen a high adoption rate of a new feature that uses generative AI to populate a summary field of a custom object, Competitor Analysis. All sales users have the same profile but one user cannot see the generative Al-enabled field icon next to the summary field. 
  What is the most likely cause of the issue?
optionA: The user does not have the field Generative AI User permission set assigned.
optionB: The prompt template associated with summary field is not activated for that user.
optionC: The user does not have the Prompt Template User permission set assigned.
